meanings.definition: Showing or expressing ill humor or irritability
meanings.sent1: She had the spleeniest expression on her face when she found out about the canceled plans.
meanings.sent2: He is always the spleeniest when he has to wait in long lines.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked spleeniest when it saw the bathwater.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds seemed to wear the spleeniest frown before the storm hit.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's voice took on the spleeniest tone as she scolded the students for being late.

meanings.definition: Having or showing a tendency to be easily annoyed or angered
meanings.sent1: The toddler became the spleeniest when his toy was taken away.
meanings.sent2: She is the spleeniest person in the office when her computer freezes.
meanings.sent3: The dog looked spleeniest when it couldn't catch its tail.
meanings.sent4: His car, the spleeniest thing on wheels, always broke down at the worst times.
meanings.sent5: The old man's face turned the spleeniest shade of red when his newspaper went missing.
